name: Cloak of Unending Life
tooltip:
Cloak of Unending LifeLevel 60

Bring 1 Qiraji Regal Drape, 2 Vermillion Idols, 5 Silver Scarabs and 5 Bone Scarabs to Keyl Swiftclaw in Silithus.  You must also obtain Revered reputation with Cenarion Circle to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Qiraji Regal Drape
- Vermillion Idol x 2
- Bone Scarab x 5
- Silver Scarab x 5
- Cenarion Circle:
